title: Crash after champ select patch 6.20
body: Ive been constantly crashing just before my game loads in and im getting extremely frustrated. Ive done everything the boards have told me to do and have re downloaded three times with no success. i recently built my PC specifically for League of Legends, and i cant even play the game. Ive been getting queue bans from this and ive emailed riot support. If anyone has a solution please contact me, i cant stand this.

replies.body:
It looks like you've already received a response on your ticket regarding this, so I recommend you continue to work with the tech specialist assigned to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZeUMYkgbNAI 

try this, it worked for me. i only got problems with the patch 6.20. I deleted the logitech content and it started to work suddenly
even if ive never used any Logitech hardware or software?
wish i could help, ive been having the same problem but only when im not playing at home ( i play on my laptop) extremely frustrating
